Pre-Game Insights: India and USA have both won two games each in the tournament
USA has a chance of making the last eight
India is eager to tap into the American market
The USA team has played a part in creating a general feeling of wanting more
Aaron Jones is the second-highest scorer in the T20 World Cup with 130 runs from two innings
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is unlikely to be upset by the weather
The New York surface has settled enough that the scary up-and-down bounce that was seen earlier in the competition seems to be a thing of the past
Others: This will be the first cricket match between India and USA across any format
Jasprit Bumrah has an average of four and an economy rate of 2.85 after picking up five wickets for 20 runs in seven overs this tournament
Aaron Jones is currently this T20 World Cup's second-highest scorer, with 130 runs from two innings at a strike rate of nearly 197
Andries Gous is in fourth place, with 100 from two innings at a strike rate of almost 139
